alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 10:01PM CDT until September 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benson County in northeastern North Dakota... Southwestern Ramsey County in northeastern North Dakota... Eddy County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1000 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Harvey to near Sykeston to near Cleveland, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Devils Lake, New Rockford, Camp Grafton, Lakewood Park, Leeds, Maddock and Fort Totten. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
